name: Escape the Flood
description:
Escape The Flood - Survive!

Welcome to Escape The Flood! A short game made in one week for
February's Monthly VR Game Jam on itch.io.

There is both a VR and a non-VR version, make sure to pick
the one that fits you.

Starting the game

1. Steam must be running (if you want VR)
2. Double-click "Tricenz-64.exe"

Controls

VR:
Left joystick to move your astronaut.
Hold the grip button to move the world.
Hold both grip buttons to rotate.
Use the right hand trigger to click on buttons.

Non-VR:
WASD to move your astronaut.
To move the camera, numpad arrows or right-click on an object and drag.
To rotate the camera, numpad 7/9 or shift-right-click on an objet.

Gameplay

The water is rising and the tower is crumbling.
To survive, you must climb quickly to the top and return to your rocket!

When you win a level, it gets checked off on the main menu.

Credits

Game design and coding: JP Martin
Title image: Claire Martin
Sounds and music: Guido Fazzito
With help from Cédric Martin.

Game built with Tricenz-64.

Enjoy!
